items.sentence: Tom used to steal apples from his neighbor\'s tree.
Can you introduce me to a doctor who speaks French?
Can you jump over a chair from a standing position?
I want to spend more time doing things that matter.
Just because he\'s rich, doesn\'t mean he\'s happy.
I had no idea Tom was going to leave me his estate.
I have no choice but to do what Tom asked me to do.
I have no reason not to do what Tom asked me to do.
I\'ve never been to Boston, and Tom hasn\'t either.
You\'re very good at playing the tuba, aren\'t you?
